name: Classic Kanjivaram Silk
description: A timeless Kanjivaram silk saree with a rich zari border, perfect for weddings and grand occasions.

name: Royal Banarasi Brocade
description: Feel like royalty in this exquisite Banarasi brocade saree, featuring intricate floral patterns.

name: Elegant Chiffon Drape
description: A lightweight and elegant chiffon saree that drapes beautifully, ideal for parties and evening events.

name: Vibrant Bandhani Georgette
description: A stunning Bandhani saree in georgette, showcasing traditional tie-dye art from Gujarat.

name: Ornate Paithani Silk
description: An ornate Paithani silk saree from Maharashtra, known for its peacock motifs and vibrant colors.

name: Mysore Silk Splendor
description: Experience the luster of pure Mysore silk with this simple yet sophisticated saree.

name: Artistic Kalamkari Cotton
description: A beautiful cotton saree featuring hand-painted Kalamkari art, perfect for a classy, ethnic look.

name: Traditional Sambalpuri Ikat
description: A handwoven Sambalpuri Ikat saree from Odisha, with unique patterns and a rustic charm.

name: Shimmering Tussar Silk
description: A Tussar silk saree with a natural golden sheen, offering a blend of comfort and elegance.

name: Graceful Kasavu Saree
description: The traditional Kasavu saree from Kerala, known for its off-white color and golden border.

name: Regal Patola Weave
description: A luxurious double ikat Patola saree from Patan, a symbol of status and tradition.

name: Chikankari Embroidery Marvel
description: A georgette saree adorned with delicate Chikankari embroidery from Lucknow.

name: Konrad Temple Saree
description: A sturdy Konrad saree, also known as a temple saree, with wide borders featuring motifs of elephants and peacocks.

name: Pochampally Ikat Splendor
description: A vibrant Pochampally Ikat saree with geometric patterns, woven in Bhoodan Pochampally, Telangana.

name: Baluchari Silk Tale
description: A Baluchari silk saree from West Bengal, depicting mythological scenes on its pallu.

name: Classic Gadwal Silk
description: A distinctive Gadwal saree with a cotton body and a contrasting silk pallu and border.

name: Muga Silk Heritage
description: An exclusive Muga silk saree from Assam, known for its natural shimmering golden tint and durability.

name: Leheriya Georgette Wave
description: A colorful Leheriya saree from Rajasthan, featuring a unique wave-like pattern.

name: Tant Cotton Comfort
description: A lightweight Tant cotton saree from Bengal, perfect for daily wear with its crisp texture.

name: Phulkari Embroidered Georgette
description: A georgette saree beautifully embroidered with Phulkari work from Punjab.

name: Ilkal Saree Charm
description: A traditional Ilkal saree from Karnataka, known for its unique weaving technique joining the body and pallu.

name: Jamdani Weave Wonder
description: An exquisite Jamdani saree, a fine muslin textile with intricate motifs woven into the fabric.

name: Narayanpet Cotton Silk
description: A lightweight Narayanpet saree with a unique style of checkered body and a contrasting silver or gold border.

name: Kota Doria Finesse
description: A feather-light Kota Doria saree, known for its square-check patterns and airy feel.

name: Chanderi Silk Cotton
description: A sheer and lightweight Chanderi saree, blending silk and cotton for a luxurious feel.
